se.kvirkel.tankwars.network

Class TWNetwork.TWEntityContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<TWGameEntity>
      • se.kvirkel.tankwars.network.TWNetwork.TWEntityContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<TWGameEntity>, java.util.Collection<TWGameEntity>, java.util.List<TWGameEntity>, java.util.RandomAccess
    Enclosing class:
    TWNetwork

    public static class TWNetwork.TWEntityContainer
extends java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<TWGameEntity>
    Synchronized entity list containing the entities and methods for returning different items in the list
